descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/9454/umbratitle1.png[/IMG][/center]

[center]Featured Videos:[/center]
[center][youtube]rHwVnsRNvzw[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]MDfwyNTgqcg[/youtube][/center]

=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim 1.5.24.0

=================
Description:
=================

Explore The Reach, Find Umbra, Claim the Sword!

Lore wise Umbra no longer exists, so doesn\'t appear in Skyrim :(, Well I couldn\'t have that, so I designed my own Umbra Sword and added it into the game.

Like previous ES titles the sword is in the hads of an Ebony clad Orc and has a Soul Trap Enchantment. 

Umbra is wandering the Reach, go find him and take the Umbra sword as your own.


Note: If you\'re having trouble finding it, look at the bottom of the readme for the spoiler.

=================
Installation
=================

1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skryim\'s Data folder.
2. Activate Insanity\'s Umbra Sword.esp

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1. De-Activate Insanity\'s Umbra Sword.esp
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

=================
Contact:
=================

InsanitySorrow @ TES Alliance

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Hanaisse for the help finding a nice location to place Umbra.

=================
Tools Used:
=================

Insanity\'s ReadMe Generator
Photoshop CS5
Blender
Creation Kit

=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

You may use this as you wish as long as you don\'t charge money for it and you credit me for any work used.

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission. 




=================
Spoiler:
=================

You\'ll find Umbra at a Campsite near Soljund\'s Sinkhole. The campsite is around the other side of the mountains, not too far from the sinkhole.
author: InsanitySorrow
